TEXT.English: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.French: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.German: %s1_CivName versuchen einen selbständigen Staat zu bilden. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: %s1_CivName stanno provando a formare una loro nazione. Cosa dobbiamo fare?
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?
TEXT.Portuguese: %s1_CivName are trying to form their own country. What shall we do?

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Do nothing; only rely on your stability and the passive military presence in the city: %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels.
TEXT.French: [BOLD]Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Do nothing; only rely on your stability and the passive military presence in the city: %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels.
TEXT.German: Einfach ignorieren, niemand würde unser mächtiges Reich verlassen wollen. (setzt ausschließlich auf die Stabilität %d1_RawOdds % Chance die Rebellen aufzuhalten)
TEXT.Italian: Ignorali, nessuno vorrà davvero abbandonare il nostro potente Impero. (dipende dalla stabilità, solo il %d1_RawOdds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: [BOLD]Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Do nothing; only rely on your stability and the passive military presence in the city: %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels.
TEXT.Portuguese: [BOLD]Just ignore them, nobody would want to leave our mighty Empire.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Do nothing; only rely on your stability and the passive military presence in the city: %d1_RawOdds % chance to stop the rebels.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebels.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Suppress with force; your military might and the number of units in the city also greatly contributes to your chances, but this action will anger the general population: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it will generate unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt if succeeds.
TEXT.French: [BOLD]Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebels.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Suppress with force; your military might and the number of units in the city also greatly contributes to your chances, but this action will anger the general population: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it will generate unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt if succeeds.
TEXT.German: Formiere die Bekämpfung der Rebellion and bezwinge diese Rebellen. (setzt auf die Anzahl der Einheiten in den Städten, erzeugt Unzufriedenheit und verursacht 1 Runde Revolte, %d1_Odds % Chance die Rebellen aufzuhalten)
TEXT.Italian: Sopprimi la rivolta. (dipende dal numero di unità presenti nelle tue città, genera infelicità e causa un turno di rivolta, %d1_Odds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: [BOLD]Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebels.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Suppress with force; your military might and the number of units in the city also greatly contributes to your chances, but this action will anger the general population: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it will generate unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt if succeeds.
TEXT.Portuguese: [BOLD]Form a crackdown of the rebellion and subjugate those rebels.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Suppress with force; your military might and the number of units in the city also greatly contributes to your chances, but this action will anger the general population: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it will generate unhappiness and causes 1 turn of revolt if succeeds.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Bribe the local Lords, the rebels have less chance to take your city without their support.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Send in your envoys; your financial contribution adjusted by your government form also contributes to your chances, but it will anger the rebel militia further: %d3_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it costs you %d1_Gold [ICON_GOLD] (full bribe = %d2_Bribe), and more attacking rebel units appear if succeeds.
TEXT.French: [BOLD]Bribe the local Lords, the rebels have less chance to take your city without their support.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Send in your envoys; your financial contribution adjusted by your government form also contributes to your chances, but it will anger the rebel militia further: %d3_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it costs you %d1_Gold [ICON_GOLD] (full bribe = %d2_Bribe), and more attacking rebel units appear if succeeds.
TEXT.German: Besteche die lokalen Fürsten, die Rebellen sind chancenlos ohne deren Unterstützung. (setzt auf die Regierungsgesellschaftsform, bezahle %d1_Gold, %d3_Odds % Chance die Rebellen aufzuhalten)
TEXT.Italian: Corrompi l'aristocrazia locale, i ribelli non hanno possibilità di sopravvivere senza il loro supporto. (dipende dalla tua forma di governo, paga %d1_Gold, %d3_Odds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: [BOLD]Bribe the local Lords, the rebels have less chance to take your city without their support.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Send in your envoys; your financial contribution adjusted by your government form also contributes to your chances, but it will anger the rebel militia further: %d3_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it costs you %d1_Gold [ICON_GOLD] (full bribe = %d2_Bribe), and more attacking rebel units appear if succeeds.
TEXT.Portuguese: [BOLD]Bribe the local Lords, the rebels have less chance to take your city without their support.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Send in your envoys; your financial contribution adjusted by your government form also contributes to your chances, but it will anger the rebel militia further: %d3_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, but it costs you %d1_Gold [ICON_GOLD] (full bribe = %d2_Bribe), and more attacking rebel units appear if succeeds.

TEXT.English: [BOLD]Do whatever it takes to keep them.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Apply both military and financial measures: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, with the combined effects of the 2 options above.
TEXT.French: [BOLD]Do whatever it takes to keep them.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Apply both military and financial measures: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, with the combined effects of the 2 options above.
TEXT.German: Unternimm alles um sie zu behalten. (kombiniere alle oben erwähnten Möglichkeiten, %d1_Odds % Chance die Rebellen aufzuhalten)
TEXT.Italian: Fai qualunque cosa per fermarli. (combina tutte le opzioni di sopra, %d1_Odds % di chance di fermare i rivoltosi)
TEXT.Spanish: [BOLD]Do whatever it takes to keep them.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Apply both military and financial measures: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, with the combined effects of the 2 options above.
TEXT.Portuguese: [BOLD]Do whatever it takes to keep them.[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Apply both military and financial measures: %d1_Odds % chance to stop the rebels, with the combined effects of the 2 options above.

TEXT.English: Thanks to god the revolt was unsuccessful, the city of %s1 remained in our hands. Now we only need to get rid of those barbaric rebels!
TEXT.French: Thanks to god the revolt was unsuccessful, the city of %s1 remained in our hands. Now we only need to get rid of those barbaric rebels!
TEXT.German: Thanks to god the revolt was unsuccessful, the city of %s1 remained in our hands. Now we only need to get rid of those barbaric rebels!
TEXT.Italian: Thanks to god the revolt was unsuccessful, the city of %s1 remained in our hands. Now we only need to get rid of those barbaric rebels!
TEXT.Spanish: Thanks to god the revolt was unsuccessful, the city of %s1 remained in our hands. Now we only need to get rid of those barbaric rebels!

TEXT.English: The %s1 revolt was successful, the city of %s2 has declared it's independence!
TEXT.French: The %s1 revolt was successful, the city of %s2 has declared it's independence!
TEXT.German: The %s1 revolt was successful, the city of %s2 has declared it's independence!
TEXT.Italian: The %s1 revolt was successful, the city of %s2 has declared it's independence!
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1 revolt was successful, the city of %s2 has declared it's independence!

TEXT.English: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?
TEXT.French: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?
TEXT.German: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?
TEXT.Italian: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?
TEXT.Spanish: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?
TEXT.Portuguese: Rumours arrived at your palace that massive barbarian hordes had emerged in the east, and they are already closing to your neighbours.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It is said that their first raging armies will probably arrive near your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]While you are quite sure that those stories must be exaggerated, maybe it would be wise to strengthen your defences, just in case?

TEXT.English: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!
TEXT.French: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!
TEXT.German: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!
TEXT.Italian: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!
TEXT.Spanish: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!
TEXT.Portuguese: Your spies report that a dangerous warlord called Tamerlane gathers a mighty force in the east, planning huge conquests.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It might even bring danger to you too, possibly arriving at your borders in a couple years (5-10 turns). Make sure that your nation is prepared!

TEXT.English: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasion is finally over.
TEXT.French: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasion is finally over.
TEXT.German: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasion is finally over.
TEXT.Italian: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasion is finally over.
TEXT.Spanish: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasion is finally over.
TEXT.Portuguese: Good news! It seems that the worst part of the %s1 invasion is finally over.

TEXT.English: Our armies, led by Belisarius, arrived at the coasts of the former Western Roman Empire, chasing your dreams: to unite the territories of Rome once again, under Byzantine leadership!
TEXT.French: Our armies, led by Belisarius, arrived at the coasts of the former Western Roman Empire, chasing your dreams: to unite the territories of Rome once again, under Byzantine leadership!
TEXT.German: Our armies, led by Belisarius, arrived at the coasts of the former Western Roman Empire, chasing your dreams: to unite the territories of Rome once again, under Byzantine leadership!
TEXT.Italian: Our armies, led by Belisarius, arrived at the coasts of the former Western Roman Empire, chasing your dreams: to unite the territories of Rome once again, under Byzantine leadership!
TEXT.Spanish: Our armies, led by Belisarius, arrived at the coasts of the former Western Roman Empire, chasing your dreams: to unite the territories of Rome once again, under Byzantine leadership!
TEXT.Portuguese: Our armies, led by Belisarius, arrived at the coasts of the former Western Roman Empire, chasing your dreams: to unite the territories of Rome once again, under Byzantine leadership!

TEXT.English: Rumours arrived about an upcoming barbarian attack on Constantinople!
TEXT.French: Rumours arrived about an upcoming barbarian attack on Constantinople!
TEXT.German: Rumours arrived about an upcoming barbarian attack on Constantinople!
TEXT.Italian: Rumours arrived about an upcoming barbarian attack on Constantinople!
TEXT.Spanish: Rumours arrived about an upcoming barbarian attack on Constantinople!
TEXT.Portuguese: Rumours arrived about an upcoming barbarian attack on Constantinople!

TEXT.English: A huge Varangian Viking army showed up at the gates of Constantinople!
TEXT.French: A huge Varangian Viking army showed up at the gates of Constantinople!
TEXT.German: A huge Varangian Viking army showed up at the gates of Constantinople!
TEXT.Italian: A huge Varangian Viking army showed up at the gates of Constantinople!
TEXT.Spanish: A huge Varangian Viking army showed up at the gates of Constantinople!
TEXT.Portuguese: A huge Varangian Viking army showed up at the gates of Constantinople!
